attributes.action: Show the cost to the taxpayer of PFI projects
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This information is extremeely hard to get.Hire Purchase, which is essentially what this is, is not revenue efficient.Because PFI does not show up as public borrowing,it is kept off Government accounts.More transparency please!

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Show the cost to the taxpayer of PFI projects."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14818.asp
